contentMain.homeinsearch: From 'impromptu' rides to adventures, discover your own recipe for joy

policy.content_1: Find your delight with nearly half a million attractions, hotels and more.
policy.content_2: Top service. Good price. And get Klook credit to get discount on your next order.
policy.content_3: Order last minute, skip the line and get free cancellation to enjoy it to the fullest.
policy.content_4: Read genuine reviews and get dedicated support. We will serve you every step of the way.

contentMain.convenient: This place has what for you
contentMain.love: During your search, tap the heart-shaped icon to save your favorite accommodations or things to do in your Favorites list.
contentMain.profileAccount: This information will be from entering your next order. Your information will be encrypted and not shared with 3rd parties

footer.contentFooter: Sign up and we'll send you the best deals
footer.intro: All content here © 2005 – 2022 Yourtours Private Company Limited. All Rights Reserved. Yourtours.com is a member of Min Close Group, the world's leading provider of online travel & related services.

setupOwner.title: Become a owner in 5 easy steps
setupOwner.commit: Please join us. We'll help you through every step of the process
setupOwner.content_step_two: How many guests would you like to welcome?
setupOwner.content_step_three: Tell guests what your accommodation has?

setupOwner.content_step_five: Please give your accommodation a name and description
setupOwner.upload: Choose from your device or drag your photo here

setupOwner.beforePostHome: Hosts are at the heart of everything we do and we look forward to experiencing the magic of welcoming guests.
setupOwner.rose: For each transaction, Yourtours will discount 10% of the commission

confirm.content_1: When you hit post, guests can find your listing on Yourtours and book any available dates.
confirm.content_2: In addition, please go to the landlord section to be able to update more information (surcharge, special day rates, ...) for your home to add more details.
confirm.active_content: When you hit post, guests can find your listing on Yourtours and book any available dates.
